metadata.title: CVE-2023-35132 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A limited SQL injection risk was identified on the Mnet SSO access controlpage. This flaw affects Moodle versions 4.2, 4.1 to 4.1.3, 4.0 to 4.0.8,3.11 to 3.11.14, 3.9 to 3.9.21 and earlier unsupported versions.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
